  • Constructor Details

    • ColumnController

      public ColumnController(ColumnRepository columnRepository, BoardRepository boardRepository, CardRepository cardRepository, CardController cardController, ColumnService columnService, BoardService boardService, CardService cardService)
      Parameters:
      columnRepository - the data container which includes all the columns
      boardRepository - the repository of the board -> used for checking whether boardId exists
      cardRepository - the repository of the cards
      cardController - the controller which controls all card crud operations
      columnService - the service used for the operations which use the column data access object
      boardService - the service used for the operations which use the board data access object
      cardService - the service used for the operations which use the card data access object

  • Method Details

    • getAllColumns

      @GetMapping("/getAllColumns") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Column>> getAllColumns()
      Returns:
      all columns in the database

    • getColumnByColumnId

      @GetMapping("/getColumnByColumnId/{columnId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> getColumnByColumnId(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId)
      Parameters:
      columnId - the id of the column which will be retrieved
      Returns:
      the column according to the input id

    • addColumn

      @PostMapping("/addColumn/{title}/{boardId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> addColumn(@PathVariable("title") String title, @PathVariable("boardId") Long boardId)
      Parameters:
      title - The title of the board that needs to be added to the database
      boardId - The board on which the column belongs
      Returns:
      A response entity of the saved column

    • editColumnTitle

      @PutMapping("/editColumnTitle/{columnId}/{title}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnTitle(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("title") String title)
      Parameters:
      columnId - the id of the column which should be updated
      title - the new title of the column
      Returns:
      whether the column was successfully updated

    • editColumnBackgroundColour

      @PutMapping("/editColumnBackgroundColour/{columnId}/{bgColour}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnBackgroundColour(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("bgColour") String bgColour)
      Change the Background colour of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      bgColour - Background colour which should replace the old Background colour of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Background colour has change, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editColumnBorderColour

      @PutMapping("/editColumnBorderColour/{columnId}/{borderColour}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnBorderColour(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("borderColour") String borderColour)
      Change the Border colour of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      borderColour - Border colour which should replace the old Border colour of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Border colour has changed, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editColumnFontType

      @PutMapping("/editColumnFontType/{columnId}/{fontType}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnFontType(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("fontType") String fontType)
      Change the Font-type of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      fontType - Font Type which should replace the old Font Type of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Font Type has changed, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editColumnFontStyleBold

      @PutMapping("/editColumnFontStyleBold/{columnId}/{bold}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnFontStyleBold(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("bold") boolean bold)
      Change the Boldness of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      bold - Boldness which should replace the old Boldness of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Boldness has changed, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editColumnFontStyleItalic

      @PutMapping("/editColumnFontStyleItalic/{columnId}/{italic}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnFontStyleItalic(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("italic") boolean italic)
      Change the Italicness of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      italic - Italicness which should replace the old Boldness of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Italicness has changed, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • editColumnFontColour

      @PutMapping("/editColumnFontColour/{columnId}/{fontColour}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> editColumnFontColour(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId, @PathVariable("fontColour") String fontColour)
      Change the Font Colour of a Column, if it exists. Receive a message on the success of the edit
      Parameters:
      columnId - The ID of the Column whose title should be changed
      fontColour - Font Colour which should replace the old Font Colour of the Column
      Returns:
      receive a message indicating the Font Colour has changed, if the Column exists. If it doesn't, receive an appropriate response to the client.

    • deleteColumn

      @DeleteMapping("/deleteColumn/{columnId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Column> deleteColumn(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId)
      Parameters:
      columnId - the id of the column that needs to be removed
      Returns:
      a response which says that the column was removed from the database or not.

    • getCardsByColumnId

      @GetMapping("/getCardsByColumnId/{columnId}") @ResponseBody public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Card>> getCardsByColumnId(@PathVariable("columnId") long columnId)
      Gives all the cards given a certain columnId
      Parameters:
      columnId - the columnId you want the cards from
      Returns:
      a List with all the corresponding cards
